name: discover
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool filepursuit.
Tool description: Search the web for files, videos, audios, eBooks & much more.
API description: Discover files using the FilePursuit API with optional filters for pagination, result type, and specific links.

start.description: The starting point for result pagination.

type.description: The type of result to filter by. Accepted values are 'filelinks' and 'all'.

link.description: A specific link to discover files from.
